entity.name: Sung hun kwag
entity.description: Independent AI Researcher specializing in conceptual AI architecture design. I design AI architectures through hypothesis-driven research, testing foundational assumptions about scalable intelligence systems using AI-augmented conceptual modeling methodologies. My work focuses on State Space Models (SSM), meta-reinforcement learning, and autonomous self-organizing systems.

projects.name: DHC-SSM-Enhanced
projects.description: DHC-SSM v3.0: Production-ready Deterministic Hierarchical Causal State Space Model with O(n) complexity. A novel state space model architecture that combines deterministic hierarchical structures with causal inference capabilities, achieving linear computational complexity while maintaining expressive power for sequence modeling tasks.

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please email me for details.

plans.name: AI Research Development Grant
plans.description: Support for continued research and development of novel AI architectures including DHC-SSM, meta-reinforcement learning frameworks, and autonomous self-organizing systems.
